title: "DystoWall"
content:
Welcome to DystoWall, your source for high-quality dystopian wallpapers! Our website features a collection of stylized illustrations depicting dark and gritty visions of the future. With metallic textures and digital glitch effects, our wallpapers are sure to add a touch of edge to your desktop or mobile device.

Whether you're a fan of cyberpunk, post-apocalyptic worlds, or just love the aesthetic of a bleak future, we have something for everyone. Browse our selection of wallpapers and find the perfect image to match your mood.

All of our wallpapers are available for free download in a variety of resolutions, making it easy to find the perfect fit for your screen. So why wait? Give your device a makeover and embrace the darkness with DystoWall.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper featuring a stylized illustration of a dystopian future, with metallic textures and digital glitch effects."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
